select * from `tb_payment_order` where YEAR(payment_date)=YEAR(NOW()) and payment_order_status >= 2 and company_id = #{merchantId}

SELECT a.id, b.company_s_name, b.platform_service_provider, b.company_contract, b.payment_inventory, b.task_id, b.acceptance_certificate, b.subpackage_payment, b.payment_date, a.real_money FROM tb_payment_inventory a JOIN tb_payment_order b ON a.payment_order_id = b.id WHERE YEAR(a.create_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(a.create_date) = #{month} AND a.worker_id = #{workerId}
and a.id=#{param4}

SELECT po.id, po.company_id, po.tax_id, po.task_name, po.task_type, po.platform_service_provider, po.worker_money, po.company_contract, po.payment_inventory, po.task_id, po.acceptance_certificate, po.payment_order_status, po.payment_mode, po.real_money, po.create_date, po.subpackage_payment, po.turnkey_project_payment, po.recevice_tax, po.merchant_tax, po.tax_status, po.composite_tax, ci.company_name, ci.bank_name AS payment_bank_name, ci.bank_code AS payment_bank_code, tp.payee, tp.bank_name AS payee_bank_name, tp.bank_code AS payee_bank_code FROM tb_payment_order po LEFT JOIN tb_tax_package tp ON po.tax_id = tp.tax_id AND tp.package_status = 0 LEFT JOIN tb_company_info ci ON po.company_id = ci.id WHERE po.id = #{paymentOrderId}

SELECT po.id, po.company_s_name, po.platform_service_provider, po.acceptance_certificate, po.payment_order_status, po.payment_inventory, po.payment_date, po.subpackage_payment, t.task_code, t.task_name, t.release_date, t.deadline_date, t.industry_type FROM tb_invoice_application ia INNER JOIN tb_application_payment ap ON ap.invoice_application_id = ia.id INNER JOIN tb_payment_order po ON po.id = ap.payment_order_id LEFT JOIN tb_task t ON t.id = po.task_id WHERE ia.id =#{invoiceAppcationId}

SELECT a.id, b.company_s_name, b.platform_service_provider, b.company_contract, b.payment_inventory, b.task_id, b.acceptance_certificate, b.subpackage_payment, b.payment_date, a.real_money FROM tb_payment_inventory a JOIN tb_payment_order b ON a.payment_order_id = b.id WHERE a.worker_id = #{param1}
and a.id=#{param2}

SELECT po.id, po.company_s_name, po.platform_service_provider, po.acceptance_certificate, po.payment_order_status, po.payment_inventory, po.payment_date, po.subpackage_payment, t.task_code, t.task_name, t.release_date, t.deadline_date, t.industry_type FROM tb_invoice i INNER JOIN tb_invoice_application ia ON ia.id = i.application_id INNER JOIN tb_application_payment ap ON ia.id = ap.invoice_application_id INNER JOIN tb_payment_order po ON po.id = ap.payment_order_id LEFT JOIN tb_task t ON t.id = po.task_id WHERE i.id IN
#{item}

SELECT po.id, po.company_s_name, po.platform_service_provider, po.acceptance_certificate, po.payment_order_status, po.payment_inventory, po.payment_date, po.subpackage_payment, t.task_code, t.task_name, t.release_date, t.deadline_date, t.industry_type FROM tb_maker_total_invoice mti INNER JOIN tb_invoice_list il ON il.maker_total_invoice_id = mti.id INNER JOIN tb_invoice i ON i.id = il.invoice_id INNER JOIN tb_invoice_application ia ON ia.id = i.application_id INNER JOIN tb_application_payment ap ON ap.invoice_application_id = ia.id INNER JOIN tb_payment_order po ON po.id = ap.payment_order_id LEFT JOIN tb_task t ON t.id = po.task_id WHERE mti.id =#{invoiceId}

SELECT t.tax_name, t.credit_code, t.tax_address, t.link_mobile, tp.bank_name, tp.bank_code FROM tb_maker_total_invoice mti INNER JOIN tb_invoice_list il ON il.maker_total_invoice_id = mti.id INNER JOIN tb_invoice i ON i.id = il.invoice_id INNER JOIN tb_invoice_application ia ON ia.id = i.application_id INNER JOIN tb_application_payment ap ON ap.invoice_application_id = ia.id INNER JOIN tb_payment_order po ON po.id = ap.payment_order_id INNER JOIN tb_tax t ON t.id = po.tax_id INNER JOIN tb_tax_package tp ON tp.tax_id = t.id AND tp.package_status = 0 WHERE mti.id = #{invoiceId} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT pi.id, pi.worker_id, pi.worker_name, pi.mobile_code, pi.id_card_code, pi.bank_code, pi.real_money, pi.task_money, po.tax_id, po.recevice_tax FROM tb_maker_total_invoice mti INNER JOIN tb_invoice_list il ON il.maker_total_invoice_id = mti.id INNER JOIN tb_invoice i ON i.id = il.invoice_id INNER JOIN tb_invoice_application ia ON ia.id = i.application_id INNER JOIN tb_application_payment ap ON ap.invoice_application_id = ia.id INNER JOIN tb_payment_order po ON po.id = ap.payment_order_id INNER JOIN tb_payment_inventory pi ON pi.payment_order_id = po.id WHERE mti.id=#{param2}

SELECT po.payment_mode, ci.company_name, ci.bank_name, ci.bank_code, t.tax_name, tp.bank_name AS t_bank_name, tp.bank_code AS t_bank_code FROM tb_payment_order po INNER JOIN tb_company_info ci ON ci.id = po.company_id INNER JOIN tb_tax t ON t.id = po.tax_id INNER JOIN tb_tax_package tp ON tp.tax_id = t.id AND tp.package_status = 0 WHERE po.id = #{payId}
